refund.title: Are you sure you want to refund this label?
refund.initialNote: Take into consideration the following important information:
refund.bullet1: Refunds typically take <0>14 days</0> to credit into your account.
refund.bullet2: You will immediately be unable to use this shipping label for postage
refund.bullet3: This action cannot be undone, but you can create a new label
refund.finalNote: Note also that USPS labels that have not been used for 30 days since creation are automatically refunded.
refund.errorText: Canada Post is still processing your initial label purchase request. To refund your purchase, please re-attempt your label refund at least 60 minutes after the time of your label purchase.

DEFAULT.firstHalf: Buy and ship your first {{minUnits}} USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{oneMonth}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer.
DEFAULT.secondHalf: Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month.
DEFAULT.expiration: Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.

specificTerms.DEFAULT_EXTENDED_TRIAL: Enjoy {{freeMonths}} months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free {{freeMonths}}-month promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first {{freeMonths}} months after sign up.
specificTerms.2FREEPRO: Enjoy 2 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 2 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first two month after sign up.
specificTerms.3MONTHSFREENOW: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
specificTerms.3MONTHSFREESUMMER: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
specificTerms.6FREEPROFS: Enjoy 6 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 6-month promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Shippo affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first 6 months after sign up.
specificTerms.BREX4MONTHSFREE: Enjoy four months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up suing the Brex promo code. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 4 months promotion per customer. Promo valid for users who receive this offer directly from Shippo or Brex. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first for months after signup.
specificTerms.FREESTYLE1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
specificTerms.NOLABELFEES: Enjoy our professional plan, which includes no per-label fees and the ability to brand your customer emails and tracking pages for free. One free Shippo professional subscription for 5 years per customer. You need to switch your plan to Professional in Shippo after applying the code. Promo valid only for users that receive the offer directly from Shippo, purchase under 5 thousand labels per month, and use Shippo's master accounts with USPS and DHL. Offer must be redeemed by December 31, 2019. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid for 5 years after redemption. Shippo reserves the right to evaluate promotions on an annual basis to account for potential changes to its plans and pricing.
specificTerms.SHIP150: Buy and ship your first USPS or DHL Express package using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Freestyle. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
specificTerms.SHIP2TEE: Buy and ship your first {{minUnits}} USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get a Shippo T-shirt. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One Shippo T-Shirt per customer, while supplies last. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.
specificTerms.SHIPHERO1000: Buy and ship your first 500 USPS or DHL Express packages using Shippo’s Master Accounts before 12/31/2019 and get $1,000 credit towards your future Shippo invoices applied in January 2020. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One $1,000 credit per customer. Limit first 100 users. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or ShipHero. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 6 months. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on 10/31/2019.
specificTerms.USPSREP01: Enjoy 3 months of our professional plan, free on us when you sign up. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One free 3 months promotion per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or USPS affiliates. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Valid only for the first three month after sign up.
specificTerms.WEEBLYTEN: Buy and ship your first USPS or DHL Express package using Shippo’s Master Accounts before {{endDate}} and get {{creditAmount}} credit towards your future Shippo invoices. Must have an active Shippo account to use code. One {{creditAmount}} credit per customer. Promo valid only for users who received this offer directly from Shippo or Weebly. May not be combined with other offers, discounts, or credits. Unused credits will expire within 1 month. Offer expires at 11:59PM Pacific Time on {{endDate}}.

shipmentInfo.customsDeclarationOptOutWarning: Caution: Most international shipments require a customs declaration. See <0>Customs Declarations in Shippo</0> for more details.
shipmentInfo.customsDeclarationOptOutWarningIcs2: WARNING: Due to ICS2, intra-EU shipments now require detailed order item data on the label. To show item details on the label, please enable customs. See <0>Customs Declarations in Shippo</0> for more details.
shipmentInfo.packageWeightDimensionsWarning: Rates are calculated based on package dimensions and weight. It's recommended to enter the correct weight and dimensions. If not, you may receive adjustment charges.

errors.orderWeightExceeded: For international orders, the package weight must be heavier or equal to the weight of the customs items ({{weight}} {{weightUnit}}).
errors.templateNameLengthExceeded: Package template name cannot be longer than {{maxLength}} characters.

lineItemModal.deleteConfirmationMessage: Deleting this item from the order may change the weight of this shipment, the item will not appear on the packing slip, and this action cannot be undone. Are you sure?

customsItemModal.deleteConfirmationMessage: Deleting this customs item from the order may change the weight of this shipment, the item will not appear on the customs declaration, and this action cannot be undone. Are you sure?
customsItemModal.deleteAllConfirmationMessage: Deleting customs items from the order may change the weight of this shipment and the item will not appear on the customs declaration. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure?

additionalServices.hazmatDisabled: Hazardous materials option cannot be updated in bulk for the selected orders.
additionalServices.shipsuranceHelperText: Insurance is through Shipsurance. They are a professional shipping insurer that is worldwide, covers parcels and freight, and can have a coverage limit over $1000. To learn about carrier limits, go <1>here<1>
additionalServices.alcoholDisclaimer: Compliant account with UPS or FedEx is required. For more info, <1>visit our FAQ</1>.
additionalServices.alcoholDisclaimerText: Compliant account with UPS or FedEx is required. For more info
additionalServices.adultSignatureTooltip: A legal adult is dependent upon the delivery location. In the USA, a legal adult is at least 21 years old.

dryIce.weightGtZero: Weight must be a number greater than zero
dryIce.dryIceGtPackageWeight: Dry Ice weight cannot be greater than Package Weight

insurance.tooManyCharacters: Items to insure is limited to 200 characters
insurance.emptyContent: Sorry, we need to know more about the content you wish to insure
insurance.emptyContentAlt: An itemization of insured items is required by Shipsurance
insurance.minInsurance: Cannot insure a value less than $1
insurance.valueRequired: A value is required to set the insurance coverage amount
insurance.valueRequiredAlt: Setting a monetary value for insurance coverage is required by Shipsurance

insurance.xcoverNote: By adding protection, you agree to the <1>terms, conditions and exclusions</1>. Protection sold by Cover Genius and powered by XCover.
insurance.weWillHelp: We'll help get your claim resolved quickly.
insurance.tos: By using insurance, you agree to the {{termsLink}}.
insurance.signatureRequired: A signature is often required by carriers to insure items over $500. A signature confirmation will be added to your order to make sure you're compliant for insurance coverage.
insurance.InsuranceValueSubtext: Do not include the cost of shipping

detailedInformation.heading: Insurance is provided by Shipsurance. Some items cannot be insured.
detailedInformation.signatureNote: Certain items require a signature confirmation to be insured. If your order is above $500 or includes alcohol, a signature confirmation will be auto-selected.
detailedInformation.requirements: Your shipment must meet packaging requirements and the outside of the packaging must not show the contents.
detailedInformation.uninsurableItems: Full list of items that can't be insured
detailedInformation.signatureRequired: Full list of items that require a signature to be insured
detailedInformation.cantInsureText: How to ship items that can't be insured

exclusions.heading: Examples of items that CANNOT be insured:

example.electronics: including TVs and monitors (laptops and cell phones are insurable, as well as most electronics without screens)
example.fragile: like stained glass or neon signs

signature.requiredAdultFullScreen: Signature required from a legal adult
signature.requiredForInsurance: A signature confirmation is often a requirement by carriers to insure items over $500. If you remove the confirmation, it might invalidate the insurance coverage.
signature.costIncluded: The cost comes from the carrier and will be included in your selected rate.

commonReasons.title: Common reasons a signature could be required upon delivery:

detail.specificItems: like laptops a signature is required
detail.regulatedItems: like alcohol a signature is required from a legal adult
detail.additionalSecurity: Requiring a signature confirmation can give peace of mind.
